item.description:
Please respond to Date Me I'm Jewish-Read information below!

Join over 100 singles 40+ for our Oldies Dance Party on May 2nd for a fun-filled evening of romantic 50’s, Rock and Roll 60’s and Saturday Night Fever 70’s Disco.

Where: Temple Ohabei Shalom, 1187 Beacon St., Brookline, MA
Date: Saturday, May 2, 2009
Time: 8PM to Midnight
Dress: To impress OR in your favorite 50’s, 60’s or 70’s costume
Admission: Only $15 if paid by April 28th OR $20 at the door

Evening includes:
- Prize for best 50’s, 60’s or 70’s costume.
- TWIST contest – Prizes for the winners.
- FREE raffle, snacks, desserts, coffee & tea.
- DJ Noah playing your favorite Oldies music.
- Wine, beer and soft drink cash bar available.

Don’t wait! Send your payment today and SAVE!

Payment options:
1. Check: Payable to Date Me I’m Jewish and include your name, phone &
email address & send to PO Box 82, Brockton, MA 02303-0082. *
2. PayPal: Go to your PayPal account. Our payment email address is
[address removed]. Notice there’s no ‘ (apostrophe) in our email name.
Please print and bring your receipt. *

* Payment policy: All sales are final and no refunds or credits can be given unless we cancel the event. We accept credit cards only through PayPal. By making your payment you agree to this policy. Please, cash only at the door.

Questions? Call Barry at 508-333-1466 or Stan at 508-572-9049
item.name: Oldies Dance Party
